topComments.author: Gary H
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fui para a exibi√ß√£o de Natal. Este lugar faz um trabalho maravilhoso. Meu filho teve uma explos√£o. O lugar √© LIMPO, as sele√ß√µes de comida eram realmente boas e n√£o esvaziariam sua carteira. Que noite √≥tima.  (Original) Went for Christmas display. This place does a wonderful job. My son had such a blast. The place is CLEAN, food selections were really good and wouldn't empty your wallet. Such a great night.

topComments.author: Meera Brahmapurkar
topComments.comment: This place is a lot of fun for kids. My 3 year old enjoyed alot. Rides are perfect for his age. Eateries are good. Shows are good. A lot to do for whole day. There is little water park inside too so don't forget swimming costumes. Grab a map from the entrance before going in. The place was a little crowded because of long weekend when we visited. To avoid long lines for rides plan accordingly. Rest areas are clean. Overall park is nice. We'll surely visit again.

topComments.author: Tiffany Belcher
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tivemos o melhor dia no Dutch Wonderland! Este era o tamanho perfeito do parque para nossa fam√≠lia nesta fase ... n√£o muito opressor. Meu filho tem 8 anos e ainda n√£o gosta de passeios emocionantes. Desfrutamos de muitos passeios e a espera n√£o foi t√£o ruim. Alguns de nossos passeios favoritos eram a pluma de madeira, o telef√©rico, os carros de choque, as tartarugas girat√≥rias e os carros antigos. Tamb√©m recomendamos os sapatos de mergulho! Ambos os shows foram muito bons! N√£o se sente na zona de respingo, a menos que queira ficar encharcado! √â basicamente parte do show garantir que voc√™ saia molhado. üòÇ. Mergulhadores altamente qualificados! A comida no almo√ßo era cara, mas havia muitas op√ß√µes. Recomendo a op√ß√£o do Mill Stream Eatery. Voc√™ pode comer no AC e a maioria das op√ß√µes do parque ficam aqui, em um s√≥ lugar: pizza, hamb√∫rgueres, comidas de frango, op√ß√µes saud√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãde couve, etc.  (Original) We had the best day at Dutch Wonderland!  This was the perfect size park for our family at this stage‚Ä¶not too overwhelming.  My son is 8 and doesn‚Äôt have the love for thrill rides just yet.  We enjoyed lots of rides and the wait wasn‚Äôt too bad.  Some of our favorite rides were the log plume, chairlift, bumper cars, spinning turtles, and the antique cars. We also highly recommend the dive shoes! Both shows were very good!  Don‚Äôt sit in the splash zone unless you wanna get soaked! It is basically part of the show to make sure you leave wet.  üòÇ.  Highly skilled divers! The food at lunch was pricey but there were lots of options.  Highly recommend the option of the Mill Stream Eatery.  You can eat in the AC and most of the park options are located here, in one spot: pizza, burgers, chicken tenders, sprouts healthy options, etc.

topComments.author: Dr. Allen Conrad
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Dia divertido para a fam√≠lia. Muitos passeios, muitas op√ß√µes de comida. As crian√ßas realmente gostaram. Muitas √°reas sombreadas por √°rvores altas e o parque s√£o bem mantidas em compara√ß√£o com outros parques de divers√µes locais. Algumas filas longas, mas n√£o tanto quanto em outros lugares. Vale a pena parar se voc√™ estiver na √°rea de Lancaster e procurando um bom dia em fam√≠lia para as crian√ßas  (Original) Fun day for the family. Plenty of rides, lots of food options. Kids really enjoyed it. A lot of shaded areas from tall trees and park is well maintained compared to other local amusement parks. Some long lines but not as long as other places. Worth a stop if you are in the Lancaster area and looking for a good family day for the kids

topComments.author: John Lauffer
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Vim aqui no final do dia com meu neto. As coisas mudaram nos √∫ltimos 50 anos. Aquela loja de presentes que eu parei para ver foi substitu√≠da por uma loja de presentes de Cavaleiro e Princesa com o mesmo tema, com espadas e roupas bregas. Que decep√ß√£o. Esta costumava ser a melhor loja de presentes em Lancaster.  (Original) Came here at the end of the day with my grandson. Things have changed in the last 50 years. That wounderful gift shop I stopped to see has been replaced with an all the same theme Knight and Princess gift shop with swords and tacky outfits. What a dissapointment. This used to be the best gift shop in Lancaster.

topComments.author: arun gnath
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Grande parque de divers√µes para crian√ßas, tantos passeios e entretenimento neste local. Vale a pena esperar nas filas (voc√™ pode esperar em qualquer outro parque). Crian√ßas com menos de 3 anos n√£o t√™m muitas op√ß√µes de passeio. O parque Dino pode ser grande. Muitas op√ß√µes de comida. Voc√™ pode economizar $ 5 se comprar ingressos online.  (Original) Great amusement park for kids, so many rides and entertainment at this location. Worth to wait in the lines( you can expect in any other parks). Kids under 3  doesn‚Äôt have much ride options. Dino park can be a large one. Many choices for food. You can save $5 if you buy tickets online.

topComments.author: jocelyn habersham
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Visitamos este parque em um domingo. Ficamos ao lado do hotel Cartoon Network. O parque foi √≥timo para crian√ßas de 9 anos ou menos. Esteja preparado para longas filas. As filas para os passeios eram muito longas e fazia muito calor. As filas para obter alimentos e bebidas tamb√©m eram longas. As crian√ßas gostaram do parque, mas n√£o caminharam no calor. Ficamos por cerca de 4 horas antes que as crian√ßas estivessem prontas para retornar ao hotel da piscina. Fiquei feliz por n√£o ter pago o pre√ßo total pelos ingressos porque n√£o ficamos muito tempo  (Original) We visited this park on a Sunday. We stayed next door at the Cartoon Network hotel. The park was great for kids 9 & under. Be prepared for long lines. The lines for rides where very long and it was very hot. The lines to get food and beverages where also long as well. The kids enjoyed the park, but not walking around In The heat. We stayed for about 4 hours before the kids where ready to return to the pool hotel. I was happy I didn‚Äôt pay full price for the tickets because we didn‚Äôt stay long

topComments.author: PhillipsVision YT
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Parque tem√°tico incr√≠vel para crian√ßas menores. Este √© o lugar perfeito para visitar quando seus filhos forem mais novos, j√° que a maioria dos passeios √© feita de acordo com seu tamanho. Este tamb√©m √© um bom lugar para todas as idades. Boa variedade de atra√ß√µes com montanhas-russas, shows aqu√°ticos, passeios aqu√°ticos e pra√ßas de alimenta√ß√£o. N√£o t√£o lotado quanto os parques maiores.  (Original) Awesome theme park for smaller kids. This is the perfect place to come to when your kids are younger since most rides are catered towards their size. This is also a good place for all ages. Good variety of attractions with roller coasters, water shows, water rides and food courts. Not as crowded as the larger parks.

topComments.author: Manish Vyas
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Definitivamente melhor do que o esperado. Este √© um lugar incr√≠vel para levar seu filho para um passeio de um dia inteiro. Toneladas de coisas e passeios para as crian√ßas se divertirem. Alguns deles tamb√©m para adultos, mas este lugar √© principalmente para o dia das crian√ßas ... Recomendaria chegar na hora da abertura do parque, j√° que h√° muito o que fazer e provavelmente n√£o h√° tempo suficiente. Definitivamente visitaria mais uma vez para fazer passeios que perdemos da primeira vez.  A comida √© ok, n√£o √© t√£o boa.  Eles t√™m a obriga√ß√£o de encerrar os passeios ao ar livre (e os passeios onde n√£o h√° cobertura a√©rea) em caso de trovoada / rel√¢mpago, por isso verifique definitivamente o tempo antes de reservar / ir para o parque.  (Original) Definitely better than expected. This is an awesome place to take your kid for a day long outing. Tons of stuff and rides for the kids to enjoy. A couple of them for adults too, but this place is primarily for kids' day out... Would recommend reach at park opening time,, since there is too much to do and probably not enough time. Would definitely visit once more to go on rides we missed the first time.  Food is ok, not that great.  They have a requirement to shut down outdoor rides(and rides where there is no overhead covering) in case of thunderstorm/lightning, so definitely check the weather before booking / going to the park.

topComments.author: Nicolas Crouzier
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Melhor que o esperado. Perfeito para crian√ßas que ainda n√£o s√£o adolescentes, eu diria. Quase todas as atra√ß√µes s√£o acess√≠veis a crian√ßas de 42 polegadas ou mais. Para crian√ßas mais baixas, o pre√ßo torna-se muito alto, pois as op√ß√µes n√£o s√£o t√£o boas. Parque √© limpo, o pessoal √© bom. A comida n√£o √© √≥tima, mas tamb√©m j√° vi coisas piores em outros parques. Voc√™ pode trazer lanches e uma garrafa de √°gua, fa√ßa isso, voc√™ vai economizar uma tonelada. No final, as crian√ßas se divertiram muito, ent√£o eu diria que o parque cumpriu sua miss√£o.  (Original) Better than expected. Perfect for kids not yet teens I'd say. Almost all rides are accessible to kids 42 inches and up. For shorter kids price becomes really steep as options are not as great. Park is clean , staff is nice. Food isn't great but I've also seen worse at other parks. You can bring in snacks and a water bottle, do it, it will save you a ton. In the end, kids had a lot of fun so I'd say the park fulfilled it's mission.

topComments.author: Maisha Richardson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Minha fam√≠lia e eu nos divertimos. Meu sobrinho de 6 anos, a filha de 4 e o filho de quase 2. Meu sobrinho conseguia fazer tudo sobre todos os passeios. N√≥s ficamos 10:30 - fechando √†s 18:00. Sem longas filas, pre√ßos razo√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãdos alimentos, os assentos horr√≠veis da JSU na hora de encontrar uma mesa.  (Original) My family and I had a ball. My nephew who is 6, daughter who is 4 and son is almost 2. My nephew was able to get on all about every ride. We stayed 10:30am- closing at 6pm. No long lines, reasonable food prices, JSU‚Äôs horrible seating when it‚Äôs time to find a table.

topComments.author: Sean Kendall
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Visitado em junho com nossos filhos, seus primos (de 3 a 10 anos) e seus av√≥s. Tempo muito bom. √ìtimo parque para crian√ßas mais jovens (idade do ensino m√©dio e mais jovens). Tivemos um bom almo√ßo na √°rea de piquenique no estacionamento. N√≥s apreciamos a atmosfera familiar, limpeza e funcion√°rios geralmente bem treinados. Espero que o parque mantenha o foco nessas coisas e mantenha a experi√™ncia do h√≥spede excelente no futuro.  (Original) Visited in June with our kids, their cousins (ages 3-10) and their grandparents. Really nice time. Great park for younger kids (middle school age and younger). We had a nice lunch in the picnic area in the parking lot. We enjoyed the family atmosphere, cleanliness and generally well-trained staff. I hope the park maintains a focus on those things and keeps the guest experience excellent moving forward.

topComments.author: Shanna Oldewurtel
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo para crian√ßas pequenas. Muito para eles fazerem. Mesmo as crian√ßas mais velhas se divertiam nas montanhas-russas. Recomende comer no canteiro de batatas. As batatas fritas s√£o fant√°sticas!  (Original) Great for small kids. Lots for them to do. Even older kids had a good time on the roller coasters. Recommend eating at the potato patch. The fries are awesome!

topComments.author: Kiera Calcaterra
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Experi√™ncia fant√°stica para toda a fam√≠lia!  Havia muitos passeios para nossos filhos (2 e 4 anos de idade), bem como passeios suficientes para que pud√©ssemos andar com eles (e at√© mesmo um casal s√≥ para n√≥s). O parque em geral estava limpo. O tamanho √© pequeno o suficiente para que voc√™ possa caminhar facilmente, mas grande o suficiente para que houvesse muito o que fazer ao longo de um per√≠odo de 2 dias.  Dia 1 (uma sexta-feira) - fizemos todos os passeios infantis que pod√≠amos. As filas s√£o r√°pidas e nunca tivemos que esperar mais de um ciclo por uma carona.  Dia 2 - passamos o in√≠cio da tarde no parque aqu√°tico. Existem se√ß√µes bem definidas para pessoas de todas as idades - uma √°rea perfeita para beb√™s / crian√ßas pequenas com um len√ßol fre√°tico e √°rea de estilo splash, uma √°rea de canh√£o de √°gua, v√°rios tobo√°guas menores para crian√ßas e, em seguida, 2 tobo√°guas grandes com jangadas para crian√ßas mais velhas andarem juntas e adultos.  Pr√≥s- grande sele√ß√£o de passeios para crian√ßas menores at√© adultos mais velhos. Muitos jogos. Bom tamanho para passeios em fam√≠lia. Parque aqu√°tico inclu√≠do. Banheiros em todos os lugares. Op√ß√µes de entretenimento com show de mergulho no aqua-teatro tye e banda de urso el√©trico. Muitas √°reas de estar e sombra. Op√ß√µes de sorvetes sem latic√≠nios. Eles limparam os passeios para covid e o parque em geral estava bem conservado.  Cons- comida, especificamente a pizza era cara. A √°rea infantil do parque aqu√°tico tinha tanto o cheiro distinto de urina que tudo que ficava molhado (todos os nossos ternos e toalhas) cheirava a urina depois que sa√≠mos.  Informa√ß√£o adicional: - as m√°scaras s√£o opcionais - alguns passeios foram fechados devido ao tempo tempestuoso e para limpeza, mas a seguran√ßa √© mais importante - n√≥s temos uma cabana que era bom por ter um lugar para sentar no parque aqu√°tico, caso contr√°rio, n√£o ter√≠amos encontrado assentos para o nosso grupo de 11. - o parque n√£o vende √°lcool, ent√£o nada de pina coladas no parque aqu√°tico, desculpe - n√≥s acampamos uma noite no Old Steam Campground e tamb√©m foi bom! Muitas comodidades (banheiros, loja bem abastecida, playground, riacho, an√©is de fogo, conex√µes para trailers, etc) a uma curta dist√¢ncia do parque de divers√µes! Uma fam√≠lia Amish veio de carro√ßa vendendo produtos assados, geleias e cerveja artesanal!  N√≥s definitivamente iremos novamente!  (Original) Fantastic experience for the whole family!  There were plenty of rides for our kids (2 and 4yrs old) as well as enough rides that we could ride with them (and even a couple just for us). The park overall was clean. The size is small enough that you can easily walk the entire thing but large enough that there was plenty to do over a 2 day span.  Day 1 (a Friday)- we did all of the kids' rides we could. The lines we fast and we never had to wait more than one cycle for a ride.  Day 2 - we spent the early afternoon at the water park. There are well laid out sections for people of all ages- an area perfect for toddlers/small children with a water table and splash pad style area, a water cannon area, multiple smaller water slides for kids, and then 2 large water slides with rafts for older kids to ride together and adults.  Pros- great ride selection for smaller kids all the way up to older adults. Plenty of games. Good size for family walking. Water park included. Restrooms everywhere. Entertainment options with a dive show at tye aqua-theatre area and an eletric bear band. Plenty of seating areas and shade. Dairy free ice cream options. They cleaned the rides for covid and the park overall was well maintained.  Cons-  food, specifically the pizza was expensive. The water park kids' area had the distinct smell of urine so much so that everything that got wet (all of our suits and towels) all smelled like urine after we left.  Additional info: - masks are optional - some rides were closed due to stormy weather and for cleaning, but safety is more important - we got a cabana which was nice for having a place to sit at the water park, otherwise we would not have found seating for our group of 11. - the park does not sell alcohol, so no pina coladas at the water park, sorry - we camped one night at the Old Steam Campground and it was also nice! Plenty of amenities (bathrooms, well-stocked shop, playground, creek, fire rings, rv hook ups, etc) walking distance to the amusement park! An Amish family came aroubd on a wagon selling baked goods, jams, and homemade root beer!  We will definitely be going again!

topComments.author: Gerardo Laino
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Wanderful lugar para desfrutar com crian√ßas e fam√≠lia. N√£o perca o show de √°gua!! Incr√≠vel. Muitas barracas de comida boa.  (Original) Wanderful place to enjoy with kids and family. Don't miss the water show!! Amazing. A lot of good food stalls.

topComments.author: Gary Sharp
topComments.comment: Great time..CHECK OUT THE PAMPHLET...  It was wonderful for my kids that are 2 and 3. Children 3 and under are free, you just have to pay for yourself (the adult) to get inside. They have rides for little kids. For kids under 36 inches.. Food is pricey but thats expected from amusement parks.. You can buy tickets at the gate but I would recommend calling ahead to make sure things are available...  They have strollers you can rent and motorized chairs you can rent also. I posted some photos that will help you see what rides kids can ride.

topComments.author: Laurie Goette
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A equipe foi amig√°vel, o parque era limpo, f√°cil de se locomover. Fomos em um dia nublado, com pouca chuva, ent√£o n√£o estava lotado. Nossos netos se divertiram muito! N√≥s tamb√©m! Compramos passes de temporada, ent√£o definitivamente voltaremos! Ansioso para ver o que mais podemos nos divertir! Altamente recomendado!  (Original) Staff was friendly, park was clean, easy to get around. We went on an overcast day, few rain sprinkles, so it wasn't crowded. Our grandsons had a great time! So did we! We bought season passes, so we will definitely be back! Excited to see what else we can have fun on! Highly recommend!

topComments.author: Anthony Liberto
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Primeira vez indo, parque agrad√°vel especialmente para os jovens. Era muito atraente visualmente, com paisagismo impec√°vel e arranjos de flores realmente impressionantes. os funcion√°rios foram todos simp√°ticos e prestativos. prob foi que eles n√£o est√£o com funcion√°rios devidamente. muitos passeios simplesmente n√£o estavam operacionais. foi-nos dito que era devido a uma falta de pessoal. para ser justo, o parque tentou alternar os passeios e abrir alguns no final do dia enquanto fechava outros. tempos de espera foram muito gerenci√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãmesmo para crian√ßas e alimentos(enquanto muito caro) foi muito bom. minha √∫nica queixa real foi n√£o ter tudo aberto enquanto carregava tudo √© admiss√£o aberta.  (Original) First time ever going, nice park especially for the young ones. It was very visually appealing, landscaped impeccably and flower arrangements really rather stunning. employees were all nice and helpful. prob was they aren't staffed properly. many rides were simply not operational. we were told it was due to a staffing shortage. in fairness the park did try to rotate rides and opening some later in the day while closing others. wait times were very manageable even for toddlers and food(while quite expensive) was pretty good. my only real gripe was not having everything open while charging everything is open admission.

topComments.author: Dave Lansing
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s fomos por um dia em julho, e este √© um lugar divertido para crian√ßas e fam√≠lias. Dutch Wonderland √© um pequeno parque tem√°tico e pode facilmente ser feito em um ou dois dias, se voc√™ fizer um dia de parque aqu√°tico. H√° um pequeno parque aqu√°tico para crian√ßas, com 3 √°reas principais de atra√ß√µes. O parque aqu√°tico tem alguns tobo√°guas reais, a maioria √© um splash pad com v√°rias maneiras de se molhar. A DW tem um hotel do Cartoon Network na propriedade, se voc√™ estiver interessado; ou alguns hot√©is na US 30 a uma curta dist√¢ncia. Os ingressos custam cerca de US $ 40 a US $ 50 para todas as idades de 3 a 65 anos e a admiss√£o ao parque aqu√°tico est√° inclu√≠da. Idosos s√£o mais baratos e crian√ßas menores de 3 anos n√£o pagam. Definitivamente, v√° relaxar com sua fam√≠lia se quiser evitar as multid√µes no Hersheypark ou no Great Adventure. Os terrenos s√£o imaculados, com at√© mesmo guardas de seguran√ßa acordando catando lixo - e os funcion√°rios s√£o simp√°ticos e prestativos.  (Original) We went for a day in July, and this is a fun place for kids and families. Dutch Wonderland is a small theme park, and can easily be done in a day- or two if you make a day of water park. There is a small water park for kids- with 3 main areas of attractions. The water park has a few actual water slide rides, most is a splash pad with tons of ways to get wet. DW has a Cartoon Network hotel on property if you‚Äôre interested; or a few hotels on US 30 within walking distance. Tickets are around $40-$50 for everyone ages 3-65 and water park admission is included. Seniors are cheaper, and kids under 3 are free. Definitely go and relax with your family if you want to avoid the crowds at Hersheypark or Great Adventure. The grounds are immaculate with even security guards waking around picking up trash- and employees are friendly and helpful.

topComments.author: Joanne Torres
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Foi divertido e fofo para crian√ßas pequenas. Houve uma queda repentina de energia no dia de trabalho, o que n√£o √© normal. No entanto, os servi√ßos de h√≥spedes solicitaram nossas informa√ß√µes para compensar de alguma forma o problema. Al√©m disso, este √© um lugar ador√°vel para crian√ßas!  (Original) It was fun and cute for young kids. There was a sudden poweroutage on labor day which is not normal. However,  guests services requested our information to hopefully compensate somehow for the issue.  Other than that this is a cute place for kids!

relateds.mainName: DelGrosso‚Äôs Amusement Park and Laguna Splash Water Park
